      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Money 1</string>
            <string language="en">Money 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geld 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Argent 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dinheiro 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soldi 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήματα 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dinero 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this exercise you learn about the currency which is used in most countries in the European Union, the Euro. Contains both sound and text.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you learn about the currency which is used in most countries in the European Union, the Euro. Contains both sound and text. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">money</string>
            <string language="sv">Europe</string>
            <string language="sv">Euro</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">money</string>
            <string language="en">Europe</string>
            <string language="en">Euro</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung erlernen Sie über die Währung,
die in den meisten Ländern im europäischen Anschluß verwendet wird,
den Euro. Enthält Ton und Text. Safir - 
Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous vous renseignez sur la 
devise qui est utilisée dans la plupart des pays dans l'union 
européenne, l'Euro. Contient le bruit et le texte. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 -
combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você aprende sobre a moeda 
corrente que é usada em a maioria de países na união européia, o 
euro. Contem  o som e o texto. Safir - vida do inglês e 
de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione imparate circa la valuta 
che è usata nella maggior parte dei paesi in Unione Europea, 
l'Euro. Contiene sia il suono che il testo. Safir -
inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση μαθαίνετε για το νόμισμα που 
χρησιμοποιείται στις περισσότερες χώρες στην Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση, το
ευρώ. Περιέχει και τον ήχο και το κείμενο. Safir -
αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2
- πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted aprende sobre la 
modernidad que se utiliza en la mayoría de los países en la unión 
europea, el Euro. Contiene el sonido y el texto. 
¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo
2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
